game.name: GravNewton
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Challenge all your skill and quick thinking ability in this precision platform game, where you are a bitrom who controller over gravity called Newton, who is trying to escape from a deformed creature that relentlessly follows him in subspace.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Challenge all your skill and quick thinking ability in this precision platform game, where you are a bitrom who controller over gravity called Newton, who is trying to escape from a deformed creature that relentlessly follows him in subspace.

reviewHighlights.text: 2D indie action platformer where you jump and avoid traps ✅Various traps such as blades, bombs, and lasers ✅Different soundtracks for each of the 12 s...
